# sectionHeaderHeight

**Instance Property**

The height of section headers in the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sectionHeaderHeight: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/automaticDimension]. If the delegate doesn’t implement [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewDelegate/tableView(_:heightForHeaderInSection:)], the table view calculates the height automatically. To override automatic height calculation, set this property to a positive value.

## Related Documentation

- **tableHeaderView**: The view that displays above the table’s content.

## Configuring header and footer appearance

- **sectionFooterHeight**: The height of section footers in the table view.
- **estimatedSectionHeaderHeight**: The estimated height of section headers in the table view.
- **estimatedSectionFooterHeight**: The estimated height of section footers in the table view.
- **sectionHeaderTopPadding**: The amount of padding above each section header.
